section.title: Supported Networking Configuration
section.p: Before configuring SolidFire as a single backend, you must ensure that the Helion OpenStack cluster and the SolidFire storage system are configured appropriately.

Many of these items are optional post-installation tasks. If you have already created and verified the items in this list, make sure you also complete the SolidFire supported configuration requirements.
Once you have created and verified the items in this list, you can move on to configuring SolidFire as a backend.
